docs.text: Welcome For full documentation visit mkdocs.org For Markdown Syntax click here Navigation Menu By default, pages are listed in the sidebar in alphabetical order. To have a different oder, create a navigation structure in mkdocs.yml. Note: No multilevel hierarchies! nav: - Introduction: index.md - about.md - Issue Tracker: https://example.com/ Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Welcome
